alert.note: Alert for Isabella; Mecosta; Newaygo; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 03 at 9:57PM EDT until April 05 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Michigan and west central Michigan, including the following counties, in central Michigan, Isabella and Mecosta. In west central Michigan, Newaygo and Oceana. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Over an inch of rain is possible tonight. Total precipitation amounts since January 1 are much above normal across the area, and at some locations are near record. Very wet soil due heavy rain on Friday may result in efficient runoff of rain water tonight. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
